attributes.action: provide his full support for the European Union ‘Reform Treaty’, and believe that a referendum on the treaty is unnecessary not only because—unlike the former European Constitution—its content merely cleans up existing treaties, but also because a referendum is against the tradition of British parliamentary sovereignty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The European Union ‘Reform Treaty’ will provide Britain and Europe with more effective decision making procedures, greater coherence, and allow all Europeans to get on with the tasks before us. It will also put in place better structures to make Europe count as a major global power on the world stage, enhancing our interests and values. We think the ‘Reform Treaty’ is good for us, and want the British government to support it.
